extendedInfo.description: ShopAdvisor keeps track of products you are interested in, and notifies you when the deal is right.ShopAdvisor does this for more than 8 million users by crawling through more than 16,000 online and local retailers.  ShopAdvisor has already sent price alerts worth more than $38 million in savings on more than 700,000 products.â¢ Never miss a deal -- when the price drops, ShopAdvisor notifies you.â¢ Know if the price is right â product information includes a 6-12 month price historyâ¢ Make informed decisions â ShopAdvisor has expert advice on all productsâ¢ Anywhere, anytime access â add to your list, check your list, and get alerts directly on your Android smartphone and on your desktop web browser.â¢ Local data - also see nearby deals from brick-and-mortar stores in your neighborhoodâ¢ Any product â ShopAdvisor constantly searches for updates on over 200 million products--Testimonials and reviewsNamed âBest of the iPhone Utilities category in App Store Rewind 2011 in the USâ âââââBoston Globe: âThe app lets users set up lists of products they want but only at a certain price. When those items hit their price sweet spot, they get an e-mail.âCollegeFashion.net: âOne of the best things you can do is to scrounge for dealsâ¦ [A] great resource is ShopAdvisor. Basically, you add the products you want onto your list and it will alert you when the price drops. Awesome, right?âCool Mom Tech: âThis handy little app acts like your personal shopper/market analyst and keeps an eye out for the specific products you want and lets you know when the price drops to suit your budget.âDigitizd: âItâs an awesome system for gift-buying in particular.â AppAdvice.com: âThis free app is a great way to shop for amazing deals and keep an eye on items you hope will go on sale.â

reviews.title: A must have application
reviews.comment: This is so handy especially comparing prices. Everyone likes a good deal and with this little application it tells you quickly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: I really like it, however it doesn\'t have the same features as it does on the ipad. There you can see the most viewed items etc.
reviews.author: Harold Arevalo

reviews.title: Useful, but not accurate
reviews.comment: Since the latest upgrade the graph calculations are off, lowest prices are better on main screen.  The manual section under some items says things about non related items.  Why do want to know about shower heads,when I\'m looking at a computer game?!
reviews.author: Kathleen Schornak

reviews.comment: I added lots of things to my watch list then after awhile..the deals start to flow in automatically. Pretty convenient.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thhis is Fu***** awsome
reviews.comment: Its so helpful wouldn\'t change a thing
reviews.author: malcolm melvin

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is the greatest app for finding deals, I love it.
reviews.author: Mina Rios

reviews.comment: Great app...
reviews.author: Bill McClellan

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: I really like that you get alerts when prices go down.
reviews.author: Anthony Daley

reviews.title: Convenient
reviews.comment: I love not having to shop all the time for things that I really want, but don\'t want to pay top price for.
reviews.author: Nicci Reising

reviews.title: Location
reviews.comment: List items found locally not only online.
reviews.author: Debbie Boswell

reviews.title: Perfect app
reviews.comment: No complaints.
reviews.author: Andrew Frost

reviews.title: Novice user
reviews.comment: Installed this app last year, but haven\'t really used it. Hopefully it will save me some $$ this Christmas.
reviews.author: Lisa S

reviews.title: Best shopping app!
reviews.comment: It saved me so much money for Christmas! I love this app.
reviews.author: Allie Myers

reviews.title: Useful app
reviews.comment: The voice search is impressive, a very convenient app. I would wish it could add new words to the dictionary. Overall is Great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great but needs a few things
reviews.comment: Why doesn\'t it save each refined search as a Reusable profile/filter. I\'d like to be able to do the exact same search day to day or even hour to hour without having to input the exact same constraints every time. Also why no price constraint section in filters? I\'d also like to see indexing from tigerdirect for electronics- they seem to consistently push the envelope on the lowest price for electronics.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good!
reviews.comment: I wasn\'t expecting it to actually work as good as it does! I can really use this. I have been looking for an app like this for over a month now so I\'m really glad I found this! Very very happy and surprised! Will definitely recommend!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice!
reviews.comment: This is a very useful app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Very nice
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome App
reviews.comment: Saved me a ton of money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Cant wait to do my x mas shopping! ,
